name: Small Dog Sling Carrier Bag, Hands-Free Dog Carrier Sling with Safety Buckle, Breathable Mesh, Adjustable Strap, Padded Back, Storage Pockets, Pet Carrier for Dogs, Cats, Puppies up to 8–10 lbs
short_description: Made for Small Pets This dog sling carrier is designed for small dogs, cats, and puppies up to 8–10 lbs with a back length of 8.7" (22 cm). Perfect as a small dog carrier, cat sling, or puppy carrier, it keeps your pet close and cozy while you shop, walk, or travel. A great hands-free pet sling carrier for small dogs and cats, making daily outings easier.

Safety & Security First Our dog carrier sling includes a safety buckle and adjustable safety belt that clip to your pet’s harness, preventing sudden jumps or falls. Use it confidently as a puppy sling carrier, cat sling carrier, or small dog sling. Your furry friend stays snug and safe inside the pet sling while you move freely.

Breathable Mesh & Adjustable Design This dog sling carrier for small dogs features breathable mesh panels that promote airflow to keep pets cool and relaxed. The adjustable side opening allows your dog or cat to peek out comfortably. Whether used as a cat chest carrier, dog body carrier, or puppy bag, it ensures your pet enjoys the ride in comfort.

Supportive Bottom & Comfy Strap Equipped with a firm support bottom pad, the pet sling prevents sliding or sinking so your pet feels stable. The wide padded shoulder strap reduces strain, adjusting 23.6–31.4 inches to fit all sizes. Whether you need a small dog purse carrier, puppy purse, or crossbody dog carrier, this sling ensures both you and your pet stay comfortable.

Supportive Bottom & Comfy Strap Equipped with a firm support bottom pad, the pet sling prevents sliding or sinking so your pet feels stable. The wide padded shoulder strap reduces strain, adjusting 23.6–31.4 inches to fit all sizes. Whether you need a small dog purse carrier, puppy purse, or crossbody dog carrier, this sling ensures both you and your pet stay comfortable.

Pockets & Easy Cleaning Multiple storage pockets let you carry treats, poop bags, keys, or a water bottle without extra bags. Machine washable for simple cleaning—just remove the support board. This versatile dog sling bag doubles as a dog purse carrier, kitten sling, or small dog bag carrier, making it the perfect everyday pet sling carrier.

Ensure your pet's safety with our secure pet sling carrier. Simply connect the safety belt, then snap it up. With these 2 layers of safety, your dog will remain secure and protected.
Tailored for pets weighing 5-18 lbs (2.2-8 kg), the cat sling carrier features an adjustable shoulder strap for effortless length modifications. Catering to both adults and children.

Our dog purse carrier is designed for comfort and convenience during walks, outings, and travels. The pet carrier is beneficial for older dogs with visual impairments, injuries, or post-surgery recovery.
The small dog carrier comes with a magnetic pocket, crafted to hold essentials such as a smartphone, puppy treats, doggy bags, and keys.

Directions 1. Positive Start: Introduce the pet sling to your puppy in a calm environment, allowing them to explore it gradually. 2. Comfort Zone: Place familiar items inside, like a favorite blanket, to create a cozy and comforting space., 3. Gradual Exposure: Start with short sessions, increasing duration slowly. Use treats and praise for positive reinforcement. 4. Indoor Practice: Begin inside the home for a secure setting before venturing outdoors., 5. Smooth Movements: Simulate walking gently to acclimate your puppy to motion while in the sling. 6. Positive Rewards: Reward with treats and praise during and after each session to build a positive association., 7. Outdoor Introduction: Gradually expose your puppy to outdoor surroundings while in the sling. 8. Patience is Key: Be patient and consistent, allowing your puppy to adjust at their own pace., 9. Familiar Scents: Include an item with your scent for reassurance and familiarity. 10. Positive Closure: End each session positively, reinforcing that the sling is a delightful experience for your puppy.
Material Denim + Fur, Metal, Polyester, Polyurethane (PU)
Included Components Adjustable Harness, Adjustable Strap, Breathable Fur Insulation, Dog Sling Carrier, Pocket
Specific Uses for Product Bus, Cycling, Indoor, Outdoor, Train
